items.name: Stasis Degradation
items.desc: Powers weakened after cryosleep; first activation after sleep rolls –2 to Stat modifier for activation until trained/adjusted (1–2 scenes).

items.name: System Vulnerability
items.desc: Neural link to the Ark can be hijacked; failed TN 12 Mental roll may allow rogue code or AI to manipulate the Synthral.

items.name: Cognitive Drift
items.desc: Exposure to Ark anomalies or magic causes –1 to Mental rolls and occasional confusion (DM discretion).

items.name: Temporal Dislocation
items.desc: (Psion only) Precognition may leave character distracted; –1 to Physical and Dex rolls during or immediately after visions.

items.name: Psychic Overload
items.desc: (Psion only) Crowds or emotional intensity impose –1 Mental while active; may skip one action per scene if overloaded.

items.name: Cult Stigma
items.desc: Viewed with suspicion by other factions; –1 Social roll in interactions with non-allied factions.

items.name: Tech-obsession
items.desc: Obsessed with tech; –1 Perception while interacting with environment or non-tech scenarios.

items.name: Arcane Isolation
items.desc: (Arcanist only) Withdrawal from non-magical beings; –1 Social rolls outside magical/familiar company.

items.name: Mental Contagion
items.desc: (Psion only) Exposure to unstable minds or corrupted systems risks memory lapses; –1 Mental rolls during prolonged exposure.

items.name: Identity Drift
items.desc: Their mutable nature makes it hard for Veilborn to maintain a consistent sense of self.

items.name: Aura Bleed
items.desc: Their emotions and intentions unconsciously leak into their surroundings.

items.name: Phantom Echo
items.desc: You sometimes “phase” in your sleep or in exhaustion, wandering the Veil and waking in strange places or drained.

items.name: Shadowed Whispers
items.desc: You occasionally murmur to unseen voices, unnerving others who overhear.

items.name: Oath Entanglement
items.desc: You made a casual promise or swore an accidental oath and are now bound to it.

items.name: Mythic Magnetism
items.desc: Their mythic aura attracts strange phenomena, ghost signals, dream intrusions, or even forgotten AI subroutines.

items.name: Sensory Overload
items.desc: Your heightened perception makes you vulnerable to chaotic environments.

items.name: Veil Sickness
items.desc: Long absence from spiritual places or communion with the Veil drains you.

items.name: Legacy Conflict
items.desc: Veilborn often carry conflicting genetic and mythic imprints. In moments of crisis, these ancestral echoes may clash.

items.name: Unstable Morality
items.desc: You believe you can act against allies if personal gain outweighs loyalty.

items.name: Veil’s Price
items.desc: Your powers demand a toll: physical deterioration, bleeding from the eyes, or temporary loss of vitality.

items.name: Hollow Pulse
items.desc: Your “heartbeat” is faint and irregular, tied to the Veil rather than life.

items.name: Humanity’s Blight
items.desc: Appearance is unsettling. –2 to Persuasion/Social rolls when trying to inspire trust. May provide +1 to Intimidation at GM discretion.

items.name: Sterility Risk
items.desc: Spliced cannot reproduce naturally. Primarily narrative/roleplay; potential stress or factional consequences.

items.name: Savage Flow
items.desc: Animal instincts rise closer to the surface. –1 to Mental rolls when resisting predatory urges or frenzy.

items.name: Flawed Splice
items.desc: Transformation is incomplete or defective. A splice-specific limitation (e.g., Aquatic cannot breathe water).

items.name: Unshifting
items.desc: Hybrid Form or fully shifted animal is permanent. Cannot revert to human or beast form.

items.name: Genetic Instability
items.desc: Unstable DNA causes degeneration. Chronic pain inflicts –1 to all rolls during stress.

items.name: Kill Switch
items.desc: Hidden programming can override or kill you. GM may activate the kill switch, forcing immediate incapacitation.

items.name: Unstable Form
items.desc: Each time you shift, roll 1d20. Mutation penalty on 1–5, stable shift 6–15, mutation boon 16–20.

items.name: Feeding Addiction
items.desc: Feeding thrills you beyond reason. Limits control; forces roleplay and Men (TN = 7) to resist feeding.

items.name: Blood Madness
items.desc: Starvation drives you toward frenzy. After three nights without feeding, roll Men (Diff = 7) daily or lose control.

items.name: Resonance Conflict (Gaki)
items.desc: Feeding from Supernaturals unbalances your essence, risking corruption and madness until purged.

items.name: Shameful Hunger
items.desc: You recoil at the thought of feeding on the living. Roll Men (TN = 7) to feed; on failure, you abstain.

items.name: Parasitic Reputation (Strigoi)
items.desc: Your kind is seen as parasitic predators, and your alliances suffer from suspicion and hostility.

items.name: Lustful Feeding (Strigoi)
items.desc: You cannot drink blood. Instead, you must feed on sexual energy and lust.

items.name: Chi Hunger (Gaki)
items.desc: Mortal blood does not sustain you. Only emotional extremes, spiritual essence, or supernatural Chi will slake your hunger.
